name: RFL_VOIDED_NOTES
description: Voided notes attached to a referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral in database.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the referral note.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: Note ID of a voided note.

columns.name: NOTE_DATETIME
columns.description: Note creation date/time of a voided note.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of user who created/modified the voided note.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
